mapper.select: select FACTORY as factory, KEY as key, VAL as val, KEYDESC as keyDesc, DATATYPE as dataType, DEMODATA as demoData, DATADATE as dataDate from DWR_EQUIPMENT_STATUS_FIDS
select FACTORY as factory, KEY as key, VAL as val, KEYDESC as keyDesc, DATATYPE as dataType, DEMODATA as demoData, DATADATE as dataDate from DWR_EQUIPMENT_STATUS_FIDS WHERE KEY=#{key}
